# color

**Instance Property**

The color of the activity indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var color: UIColor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you set a color for an activity indicator, it overrides the color provided by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView/style-swift.property] property.

## Configuring the activity indicator appearance

- **style**: The basic appearance of the activity indicator.
